description:
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 14px;font-family: sf pro text;"><strong>HOW BECOME A PROBABILITY & STATISTICS MASTER IS SET UP TO MAKE COMPLICATED MATH EASY:</strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 14px;font-family: sf pro text;">This 163-lesson course includes video and text explanations of everything from Probability and Statistics, and it includes 45 quizzes (with solutions!) and an additional 8 workbooks with extra practice problems, to help you test your understanding along the way. Become a Probability & Statistics Master is organized into the following sections:</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Visualizing data, including bar graphs, pie charts, Venn diagrams, histograms, and dot plots</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Analyzing data, including mean, median, and mode, plus range and IQR and box-and-whisker plots</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Data distributions, including mean, variance, and standard deviation, and normal distributions and z-scores</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Probability, including union vs. intersection and independent and dependent events and Bayes' theorem</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Discrete random variables, including binomial, Bernoulli, Poisson, and geometric random variables</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Sampling, including types of studies, bias, and sampling distribution of the sample mean or sample proportion, and confidence intervals</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Hypothesis testing, including inferential statistics, significance levels, type I and II errors, test statistics, and p-values</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text;">Regression, including scatterplots, correlation coefficient, the residual, coefficient of determination, RMSE, and chi-square</span></li>
</ul>
overview: Visualizing data, including bar graphs, pie charts, venn diagrams, histograms, and dot plots
title: Learn everything from Probability & Statistics, then test your knowledge with 600+ practice questions

description:
<p style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">Multi threading in Java is the most essential feature that each and every Java developer should understand and be able to confidently apply it in solving complex programming problems where concurrent execution is a must. With parallel processing there comes a risk, i.e. shared mutability and the ability of the developer to solve concurrency problems. </span></p>
<p style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">Thanks to the Java programming language that it makes the mighty multi-threaded application development a cake walk, if you assimilate few keys or core concepts you will be able to confidently design multi threaded applications with ease.</span></p>
<p style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">To design multi threaded applications developers need to look at it through a different perspective i.e. change the thinking from serial to parallel and it requires some effort. Keeping this in mind this course contains the essential lectures which can guide you in this regard.</span></p>
<p style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">This course was designed keeping the above points in mind and will help you understand these complex problems through simplified and easy to understand examples. </span></p>
<p style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">Course contents include</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>Understanding Threads, Priorities, States, Daemon Threads.</strong></span></li>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>Thread synchronization using synchronized blocks and locks.</strong></span></li>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>Key components of java.util.concurrent package including ForkJoinPool and ForkJoinTask(s).</strong></span></li>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>Mock HttpServer to explain how HTTP works and simulate how a typical web server responds to the client requests.</strong></span></li>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>ThreadLocal</strong></span></li>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>Introduction to distributed locks</strong></span></li>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>An overview of how to build scalable applications using Messaging Queues.</strong></span></li>
<li style="text-align:left;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: inherit;font-family: Arial;"><strong>Introduction to Lambdas and Streams (Coming up)</strong></span></li>
</ul>
title: Java: Multi-threading and Concurrency Simplified

description:
<ul>
<li style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">ATF is a platform-wide, global feature of ServiceNow.</span></li>
<li style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">Automated Test Framework focuses to automate most of the manual testing as much as possible.</span></li>
<li style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">Creation and execution of automated tests in ServiceNow instance can be performed by a person with any scripting knowledge.</span></li>
<li style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">ATF helps in reducing the manual efforts in test execution.</span></li>
<li style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">Test execution can be scheduled to be run on a specified time frame with minimal manual intervention.</span></li>
<li style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(60,59,55);font-size: 14px;font-family: Arial;">Scheduled Test results are shared by email to respective recipients.</span></li>
</ul>
title: Automated Test Framework

description:
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 14px;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">This is not your typical accounting course! </span></p>
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 14px;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">    Professor Turner has taught thousands of students basic accounting.  He has developed shortcuts and analogies to make learning accounting easy.  If you want to understand this subject in a simple, fun way then this brief introductory course is for you. </span></p>
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 14px;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">    This course will show you the very basics of accounting.  You can complete it in about an hour.  The course includes videos of the instructor at the whiteboard.  You will complete simple quizzes to reinforce what you have learned.  This course is intended for business owners, business students, managers or anyone who wants to understand basic accounting.  It presents the information in an understandable format.  Even if you have taken an accounting course you will find the material insightful. </span></p>
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 14px;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>    The course introduces </strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The Accounting Equation (One you can understand!)</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Balance Sheets</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Income Statements</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Debits and Credits (And how to know which is which!)</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Why Profit Does Not Equal Cash!</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 14px;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">    If you have dreaded the thought of learning accounting, this is exactly the introduction you will welcome! </span></p>

<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>#1 Best Selling Accounting Course on Udemy (Learn Finance and Accounting the Easy Way)!     ** ACCORDING TO BUSINESS INSIDER: "</strong><strong><em>Haroun is one of the highest rated professors on Udemy, so you can expect to be in good hands through the course of your education</em></strong><strong>." **  He is the author of the best selling business course on Udemy this year called</strong><strong><em> 'An Entire MBA in 1 Course'</em></strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>This course will help you understand accounting, finance, financial modeling and valuation from scratch (no prior accounting, finance, modeling or valuation experience is required).</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">By the end of this course, you will also know how to value companies using several different valuation methodologies that I have used during my Wall Street career so you can come up with target prices for the companies that you are analyzing.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">By the end of this course, you will also know how to analyze financial statements using many different financial ratios/formulas that I have used in my hedge fund, Goldman Sachs and venture capital career.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The Learning objectives of the course are as follows:</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Understand how to read and analyze financial statements like a Balance Sheet, an Income Statement, and a Cash Flow Statement.</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Discover the best modeling practices to be able to create your own financial statements.</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Recognize the role macroeconomics plays in modeling.</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Identify the different resources to research financial statements of public companies.</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Determine how to create a forecasting model from the financial statements.</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">List the most commonly used valuation methods.</span></li>

You will receive <strong>detailed explanations, practical cases and quizzes</strong>.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Within 4-5 hours you’ll obtain all the essentials of basic finance and budgeting. <p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The course starts by introducing accounting basics and then teaches you to understand financial statements.</span></p>

These are the things you must know to succeed in a new business or make your current business more profitable.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">We will even have fun analyzing the financial statements of corporate giants like Apple, Facebook, and Ford.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Along the way, you will learn how to make your own financial statements, create a great budget, and how to run your business. And it's not just technology companies that need Hadoop; even the New York Times uses Hadoop for processing images.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">This course is comprehensive, covering</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>over 25 different technologies</strong></span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">in over</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>14 hours of video lectures</strong>. It's filled with hands-on activities and exercises, so you get some real experience in using Hadoop - it's not just theory.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">You'll find a range of activities in this course for people at every level. If you're a project manager who just wants to learn the buzzwords, there are web UI's for many of the activities in the course that require no programming knowledge. If you're comfortable with command lines, we'll show you how to work with them too. And if you're a programmer, I'll challenge you with writing real scripts on a Hadoop system using</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>Scala, Pig Latin,</strong></span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">and</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>Python</strong>.</span></p>

Plus a valuable completion certificate is waiting for you at the end! </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Please note the focus on this course is on application development, not Hadoop administration. Although you will pick up some administration skills along the way.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Knowing how to wrangle "big data" is an incredibly valuable skill for today's top tech employers. Don't be left behind -</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>enroll now!</strong></span></p>

overview: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts. Code templates included.
title: Machine Learning A-Z™: Hands-On Python & R In Data Science

description:
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>New! </strong><strong><em>Updated for 2021</em></strong></span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><em>with extra content on generative models: variational auto-encoders (VAE's) and generative adversarial models (GAN's)</em></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Machine Learning and artificial intelligence (AI) is everywhere; if you want to know how companies like Google, Amazon, and even Udemy extract meaning and insights from massive data sets, this data science course will give you the fundamentals you need. Data Scientists enjoy one of the top-paying jobs, with an average salary of $120,000 according to Glassdoor and Indeed. That's just the average! And it's not just about money - it's interesting work too!</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">If you've got some programming or scripting experience, this course will teach you the techniques used by real data scientists and machine learning practitioners in the tech industry - and prepare you for a move into this hot career path. This comprehensive machine learning tutorial includes over</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>100 lectures</strong></span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">spanning</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>15 hours of video</strong>, and most topics include</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>hands-on Python code examples</strong></span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">you can use for reference and for practice. I’ll draw on</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>my 9 years of experience at Amazon and IMDb</strong></span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">to guide you through what matters, and what doesn’t.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Each concept is introduced in plain English, avoiding confusing mathematical notation and jargon. It’s then demonstrated using Python code you can experiment with and build upon, along with notes you can keep for future reference. You won't find academic, deeply mathematical coverage of these algorithms in this course - the focus is on practical understanding and application of them. At the end, you'll be given a</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>final project</strong></span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">to apply what you've learned!</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The topics in this course come from an analysis of real requirements in data scientist job listings from the biggest tech employers. We'll cover the machine learning, AI, and data mining techniques real employers are looking for, including:</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Deep Learning / Neural Networks (MLP's, CNN's, RNN's) with TensorFlow and Keras</span></li>

<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Sentiment analysis</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Image recognition and classification</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Regression analysis</span></li>
