There's also an entire section</span> <span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>on machine learning with Apache Spark</strong>, which lets you scale up these techniques to "big data" analyzed on a computing cluster.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">If you're new to Python, don't worry - the course starts with a crash course. If you've done some programming before, you should pick it up quickly. This course shows you how to get set up on Microsoft Windows-based PC's, Linux desktops, and Macs.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">If you’re a programmer looking to switch into an exciting new career track, or a data analyst looking to make the transition into the tech industry – this course will teach you the basic techniques used by real-world industry data scientists. These are topics any successful technologist absolutely needs to know about, so what are you waiting for? <strong>Enroll now!</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong><em>"I started doing your course... Eventually I got interested and never thought that I will be working for corporate before a friend offered me this job. I am learning a lot which was impossible to learn in academia and enjoying it thoroughly. To me, your course is the one that helped me understand how to work with corporate problems. How to think to be a success in corporate AI research. I find you the most impressive instructor in ML, simple yet convincing." - Kanad Basu, PhD</em></strong></span></li>
</ul>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: inherit;background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 2.4rem;font-family: sf pro display", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Who this course is for:</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Software developers or programmers who want to transition into the lucrative data science and machine learning career path will learn a lot from this course.</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Technologists curious about how deep learning really works</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Data analysts in the finance or other non-tech industries who want to transition into the tech industry can use this course to learn how to analyze data using code instead of tools. But, you'll need some prior experience in coding or scripting to be successful.</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">If you have no prior coding or scripting experience, you should NOT take this course - yet. Go take an introductory Python course first.</span></li>
</ul>
overview: Complete hands-on machine learning tutorial with data science, Tensorflow, artificial intelligence, and neural networks
title: Machine Learning, Data Science and Deep Learning with Python

description:
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">*** As seen on Kickstarter ***</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Artificial intelligence is growing exponentially. There is no doubt about that. Self-driving cars are clocking up millions of miles, IBM Watson is diagnosing patients better than armies of doctors and Google Deepmind's AlphaGo beat the World champion at Go - a game where intuition plays a key role.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">But the further AI advances, the more complex become the problems it needs to solve. And only Deep Learning can solve such complex problems and that's why it's at the heart of Artificial intelligence.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>--- Why Deep Learning A-Z? ---</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Here are five reasons we think Deep Learning A-Z™ really is different, and stands out from the crowd of other training programs out there:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>1. ROBUST STRUCTURE </strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The first and most important thing we focused on is giving the course a robust structure. Deep Learning is very broad and complex and to navigate this maze you need a clear and global vision of it. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">That's why we grouped the tutorials into two volumes, representing the two fundamental branches of Deep Learning: Supervised Deep Learning and Unsupervised Deep Learning. With each volume focusing on three distinct algorithms, we found that this is the best structure for mastering Deep Learning.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>2. INTUITION TUTORIALS</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">So many courses and books just bombard you with the theory, and math, and coding... But they forget to explain, perhaps, the most important part: <strong>why you are doing what you are doing. </strong>And that's how this course is so different. We focus on developing an intuitive <em>*feel*</em> for the concepts behind Deep Learning algorithms.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">With our intuition tutorials you will be confident that you understand all the techniques on an instinctive level. And once you proceed to the hands-on coding exercises you will see for yourself how much more meaningful your experience will be. This is a game-changer.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>3. EXCITING PROJECTS</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Are you tired of courses based on over-used, outdated data sets?</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Yes? Well then you're in for a treat.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Inside this class we will work on Real-World datasets, to solve Real-World business problems. (Definitely not the boring iris or digit classification datasets that we see in every course). In this course we will solve six real-world challenges:</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Artificial Neural Networks to solve a Customer Churn problem</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Convolutional Neural Networks for Image Recognition</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Recurrent Neural Networks to predict Stock Prices</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Self-Organizing Maps to investigate Fraud</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Boltzmann Machines to create a Recomender System</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Stacked Autoencoders* to take on the challenge for the <strong>Netflix $1 Million prize</strong></span></li>
</ul>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><em>*Stacked Autoencoders is a brand new technique in Deep Learning which didn't even exist a couple of years ago. We haven't seen this method explained anywhere else in sufficient depth.</em></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>4. HANDS-ON CODING </strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In Deep Learning A-Z™ we code together with you. Every practical tutorial starts with a blank page and we write up the code from scratch. This way you can follow along and understand exactly how the code comes together and what each line means. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In addition, we will purposefully structure the code in such a way so that you can download it and apply it in your own projects. Moreover, we explain step-by-step where and how to modify the code to insert YOUR dataset, to tailor the algorithm to your needs, to get the output that you are after. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">This is a course which naturally extends into your career.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>5. IN-COURSE SUPPORT</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Have you ever taken a course or read a book where you have questions but cannot reach the author? </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Well, this course is different. We are fully committed to making this the most disruptive and powerful Deep Learning course on the planet. With that comes a responsibility to constantly be there when you need our help.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In fact, since we physically also need to eat and sleep we have put together a team of professional Data Scientists to help us out. Whenever you ask a question you will get a response from us within 48 hours maximum. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">No matter how complex your query, we will be there. The bottom line is we want you to succeed. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>--- The Tools ---</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Tensorflow and Pytorch are the two most popular open-source libraries for Deep Learning. In this course you will learn both!</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">TensorFlow was developed by Google and is used in their speech recognition system, in the new google photos product, gmail, google search and much more. Companies using Tensorflow include AirBnb, Airbus, Ebay, Intel, Uber and dozens more. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">PyTorch is as just as powerful and is being developed by researchers at Nvidia and leading universities: Stanford, Oxford, ParisTech. Companies using PyTorch include Twitter, Saleforce and Facebook.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">So which is better and for what? </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Well, in this course you will have an opportunity to work with both and understand when Tensorflow is better and when PyTorch is the way to go. Throughout the tutorials we compare the two and give you tips and ideas on which could work best in certain circumstances.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The interesting thing is that both these libraries are barely over 1 year old. That's what we mean when we say that in this course we teach you the most cutting edge Deep Learning models and techniques.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>--- More Tools ---</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><em>Theano </em>is another open source deep learning library. It's very similar to Tensorflow in its functionality, but nevertheless we will still cover it.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><em>Keras </em>is an incredible library to implement Deep Learning models. It acts as a wrapper for Theano and Tensorflow. Thanks to Keras we can create powerful and complex Deep Learning models with only a few lines of code. This is what will allow you to have a global vision of what you are creating. Everything you make will look so clear and structured thanks to this library, that you will really get the intuition and understanding of what you are doing.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>--- Even More Tools ---</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><em>Scikit-learn </em>the most practical Machine Learning library. We will mainly use it:  </span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">to evaluate the performance of our models with the most relevant technique, k-Fold Cross Validation</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">to improve our models with effective Parameter Tuning</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">to preprocess our data, so that our models can learn in the best conditions</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">And of course, we have to mention the usual suspects. This whole course is based on Python and in every single section you will be getting hours and hours of invaluable hands-on practical coding experience. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Plus, throughout the course we will be using Numpy to do high computations and manipulate high dimensional arrays, Matplotlib to plot insightful charts and Pandas to import and manipulate datasets the most efficiently.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>--- Who Is This Course For? ---</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">As you can see, there are lots of different tools in the space of Deep Learning and in this course we make sure to show you the most important and most progressive ones so that when you're done with Deep Learning A-Z™ your skills are on the cutting edge of today's technology.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>If you are just starting out into Deep Learning, </strong>then you will find this course extremely useful. Deep Learning A-Z™ is structured around special coding blueprint approaches meaning that you won't get bogged down in unnecessary programming or mathematical complexities and instead you will be applying Deep Learning techniques from very early on in the course. You will build your knowledge from the ground up and you will see how with every tutorial you are getting more and more confident.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>If you already have experience with Deep Learning, </strong>you will find this course refreshing, inspiring and very practical. Inside Deep Learning A-Z™ you will master some of the most cutting-edge Deep Learning algorithms and techniques (some of which didn't even exist a year ago) and through this course you will gain an immense amount of valuable hands-on experience with real-world business challenges. Plus, inside you will find inspiration to explore new Deep Learning skills and applications.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>--- Real-World Case Studies ---</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Mastering Deep Learning is not just about knowing the intuition and tools, it's also about being able to apply these models to real-world scenarios and derive actual measurable results for the business or project. That's why in this course we are introducing six exciting challenges:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>#1 Churn Modelling Problem</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In this part you will be solving a data analytics challenge for a bank. You will be given a dataset with a large sample of the bank's customers. To make this dataset, the bank gathered information such as customer id, credit score, gender, age, tenure, balance, if the customer is active, has a credit card, etc. During a period of 6 months, the bank observed if these customers left or stayed in the bank. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Your goal is to make an Artificial Neural Network that can predict, based on geo-demographical and transactional information given above, if any individual customer will leave the bank or stay (customer churn). Besides, you are asked to rank all the customers of the bank, based on their probability of leaving. To do that, you will need to use the right Deep Learning model, one that is based on a probabilistic approach. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">If you succeed in this project, you will create significant added value to the bank. By applying your Deep Learning model the bank may significantly reduce customer churn.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>#2 Image Recognition</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In this part, you will create a Convolutional Neural Network that is able to detect various objects in images. We will implement this Deep Learning model to recognize a cat or a dog in a set of pictures. However, this model can be reused to detect anything else and we will show you how to do it - by simply changing the pictures in the input folder. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">For example, you will be able to train the same model on a set of brain images, to detect if they contain a tumor or not. But if you want to keep it fitted to cats and dogs, then you will literally be able to a take a picture of your cat or your dog, and your model will predict which pet you have. We even tested it out on Hadelin’s dog!</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>#3 Stock Price Prediction</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In this part, you will create one of the most powerful Deep Learning models. We will even go as far as saying that you will create the Deep Learning model closest to <em>“Artificial Intelligence”</em>. Why is that? Because this model will have long-term memory, just like us, humans. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The branch of Deep Learning which facilitates this is Recurrent Neural Networks. Classic RNNs have short memory, and were neither popular nor powerful for this exact reason. But a recent major improvement in Recurrent Neural Networks gave rise to the popularity of LSTMs (Long Short Term Memory RNNs) which has completely changed the playing field. We are extremely excited to include these cutting-edge deep learning methods in our course! </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In this part you will learn how to implement this ultra-powerful model, and we will take the challenge to use it to predict the real Google stock price. A similar challenge has already been faced by researchers at Stanford University and we will aim to do at least as good as them. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong> #4 Fraud Detection</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">According to a recent report published by Markets & Markets the Fraud Detection and Prevention Market is going to be worth $33.19 Billion USD by 2021. This is a huge industry and the demand for advanced Deep Learning skills is only going to grow. That’s why we have included this case study in the course.  </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">This is the first part of Volume 2 - Unsupervised Deep Learning Models. The business challenge here is about detecting fraud in credit card applications. You will be creating a Deep Learning model for a bank and you are given a dataset that contains information on customers applying for an advanced credit card. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">This is the data that customers provided when filling the application form. Your task is to detect potential fraud within these applications. That means that by the end of the challenge, you will literally come up with an explicit list of customers who potentially cheated on their applications.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>#5 & 6 Recommender Systems</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">From Amazon product suggestions to Netflix movie recommendations - good recommender systems are very valuable in today's World. And specialists who can create them are some of the top-paid Data Scientists on the planet.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">We will work on a dataset that has exactly the same features as the Netflix dataset: plenty of movies, thousands of users, who have rated the movies they watched. The ratings go from 1 to 5, exactly like in the Netflix dataset, which makes the Recommender System more complex to build than if the ratings were simply “Liked” or “Not Liked”. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Your final Recommender System will be able to predict the ratings of the movies the customers didn’t watch. Accordingly, by ranking the predictions from 5 down to 1, your Deep Learning model will be able to recommend which movies each user should watch. Creating such a powerful Recommender System is quite a challenge so we will give ourselves two shots. Meaning we will build it with two different Deep Learning models.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Our first model will be Deep Belief Networks, complex Boltzmann Machines that will be covered in Part 5. Then our second model will be with the powerful AutoEncoders, my personal favorites. You will appreciate the contrast between their simplicity, and what they are capable of.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">And you will even be able to apply it to yourself or your friends. The list of movies will be explicit so you will simply need to rate the movies you already watched, input your ratings in the dataset, execute your model and voila! The Recommender System will tell you exactly which movies you would love one night you if are out of ideas of what to watch on Netflix!  </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>--- Summary ---</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">In conclusion, this is an exciting training program filled with intuition tutorials, practical exercises and real-World case studies. </span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">We are super enthusiastic about Deep Learning and hope to see you inside the class!</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Kirill & Hadelin</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: inherit;background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: 2.4rem;font-family: sf pro display", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Who this course is for:</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Anyone interested in Deep Learning</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Students who have at least high school knowledge in math and who want to start learning Deep Learning</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Any intermediate level people who know the basics of Machine Learning or Deep Learning, including the classical algorithms like linear regression or logistic regression and more advanced topics like Artificial Neural Networks, but who want to learn more about it and explore all the different fields of Deep Learning</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Anyone who is not that comfortable with coding but who is interested in Deep Learning and wants to apply it easily on datasets</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Any students in college who want to start a career in Data Science</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Any data analysts who want to level up in Deep Learning</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Any people who are not satisfied with their job and who want to become a Data Scientist</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Any people who want to create added value to their business by using powerful Deep Learning tools</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Any business owners who want to understand how to leverage the Exponential technology of Deep Learning in their business</span></li>
<li style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Any Entrepreneur who wants to create disruption in an industry using the most cutting edge Deep Learning algorithms</span></li>
</ul>
overview: Learn to create Deep Learning Algorithms in Python from two Machine Learning & Data Science experts. Templates included.
title: Deep Learning A-Z™: Hands-On Artificial Neural Networks

description:
<p style="text-align:start;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Have you tried to learn Node before? You start a new course, and the instructor has you installing a bunch of libraries before you even know what Node is or how it works. You eventually get stuck and reach out to the instructor, but you get no reply. You then close the course and never open it again.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">Sound familiar?</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>I created this course to be what I wanted when I was learning Node.</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The Complete Node.js Developer Course covers the fundamentals of Node before diving deep into great tools like Express, Mongoose, and MongoDB.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">The entire course is based around a single goal: Turning you into a professional Node developer capable of developing, testing, and deploying real-world production applications.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;"><strong>The best way to learn Node is by building Node apps.</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">From the very start you’ll be programming every project and working through challenges that I’ve designed to reinforce what you’ve learned. This will give you the hands-on experience necessary to be able to create and launch your own project once you’re done.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">You’ll be building four projects:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">1. A note-taking app to get your feet wet</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">2. A weather application that interacts with the MapBox and Dark Sky APIs</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:0px;"><span style="color: rgb(28,29,31);background-color: rgb(255,255,255);font-size: inherit;font-family: sf pro text", -apple-system, system-ui, Roboto, "segoe ui", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "apple color emoji", "segoe ui emoji", "segoe ui symbol;">3.
